G

game - package game
Package containing classes responsible for game mechanics.
GAME_GRID_HEIGHT - Static variable in class properties.GraphicsSettings
Grid height in pixels.
GAME_GRID_OFFSET_X - Static variable in class properties.GraphicsSettings
Grid left-top corner x coordinate relative to the game window.
GAME_GRID_OFFSET_Y - Static variable in class properties.GraphicsSettings
Grid left-top corner y coordinate relative to the game window.
GAME_GRID_WIDTH - Static variable in class properties.GraphicsSettings
Grid width in pixels.
GAME_TARGET_FRAME_DELAY - Static variable in class properties.GameSettings
Refresh rate in milliseconds of the game frame.
GAME_TEMPO - Static variable in class properties.GameSettings
Time in milliseconds of each game step.
GAME_WINDOW_HEIGHT - Static variable in class properties.GraphicsSettings
Game window height in pixels.
GAME_WINDOW_WIDTH - Static variable in class properties.GraphicsSettings
Game window width in pixels.
gameFrame - Class in main
Class managing the main game window.
gameFrame() - Constructor for class main.gameFrame
Sets up the frame and starts the timer used for refreshing the graphics in the frame.
GameManager - Class in main
Class managing the course of the game.
GameManager() - Constructor for class main.GameManager
Creates a new GameManager object.
gameOver() - Method in class main.GameManager
 
GameSettings - Class in properties
Class containing constants that have anything to do with the gameplay.
GameSettings() - Constructor for class properties.GameSettings
 
gameTimer - Variable in class main.GameManager
Timer triggering the singleton when the new game step has to be performed.
generateNextTetromino() - Static method in class game.TetrominoSpawner
Adds a new tetromino into the queue to spawn.
getColor() - Method in class game.Tile
 
getInstance() - Static method in class main.GameManager
The static method for global class object access.
getPoints() - Method in class main.GameManager
Get player's current points number.
getTile(int, int) - Static method in class game.Grid
Returns the tile at x, y.
getTile(int) - Method in class game.Tetromino
Gets the specific tile of the tetromino.
getTileX(int) - Method in class game.Tetromino
Gets the x coordinate of the specific tetromino tile.
getTileY(int) - Method in class game.Tetromino
Gets the y coordinate of the specific tetromino tile.
GraphicsSettings - Class in properties
Contains constants that have to do with the game graphics.
GraphicsSettings() - Constructor for class properties.GraphicsSettings
 
Grid - Class in game
Class used for both managing and drawing the grid of tiles.
Grid() - Constructor for class game.Grid
 
GRID_HEIGHT - Static variable in class properties.GameSettings
Number of tiles that fit into the grid vertically.
GRID_WIDTH - Static variable in class properties.GameSettings
Number of tiles that fit into the grid horizontally.
